revised_title: A Description of the Aponensian Baths and Their Salt
tldr: The author, Mr. Dodington, describes the Aponensian Baths near Padua and their unique properties, including their hot and salty water. He explains how the locals collect salt from the water and use it for various purposes, such as whitening their clothes. He also mentions the difference between the salt collected from the water and the salt collected from the stones, gravel, and earth around the baths.
